Content: The Education Ministry has decided to close all Government schools on the 15th of this month. The Education Ministry has announced that the schools are closed on the15th due to the Presidential election slated to be held on the 16th of this month. The Education Ministry has taken this decision due to a request made by the Elections Commission to use school buildings and premises for polling booths and counting centres. All schools that would be used as polling booths will be handed over to the GramaNildharis after school hours on the 14th. The Education Ministry has also approved the Elections Commission using schools as Vote Counting Centres.
